= Theorems =

The following table gives a list of theorems we need to prove in Coq
to complete our project.  

Rotman # refers to the book
"Galois Theory" by Joseph Rotman.  (Springer-Verlag, 1991).
Regular font refers to theorem numbers from that text.
Italic font refers to exercise numbers that are used in the proofs.

Done is one of {Yes, No, In Progress}.

Coq is a link to the formal statement of the theorem in the
Coq source.

Date is the projected date we hope to have the theorem completed by.
